title: Tainted Cocaine Kills More Than 20 People in Argentina
sub_head: Officials in Buenos Aires believe the cocaine was laced with fentanyl
body:
More than 20 people died and dozens more hospitalized in the poor outskirts of Argentina’s capital after consuming tainted cocaine, officials said Thursday as they rushed to get the adulterated drugs off the streets.
“This is absolutely exceptional, there is no precedent,” said Marcelo Lapargo, a prosecutor in the Buenos Aires suburb of San Martin, where the deaths occured. “It’s a matter of urgency to get this poison out of the market.”
